de.bzus.graph3d

Class ViewAngle

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bzus.graph3d.ViewAngle

  • public class ViewAngle
extends java.lang.Object
    ViewAngle provides methods for constructing a 2 dimensional projection out of a 3 dimensional model based on a view angle. This is given by a vector resp. two angles that determine its angle to the z-axis and the angle to the x-axis of its projection to the x-y plane
    Author:
    Werner Siegfried Genreith
